title: Caffè Latte
detail: Rich, full-bodied espresso in steamed milk, lightly topped with foam. A caffè latte is simply a shot or two of bold, tasty espresso with fresh, sweet steamed milk over it.

title: Cappuccino
detail: Espresso with steamed milk, topped with a deep layer of foam. A classic Italian coffee with rich texture and smooth flavor.

title: Caffè Mocha
detail: Espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, topped with sweetened whipped cream. Perfect for those who love both coffee and chocolate.

title: Caramel Macchiato
detail: Espresso combined with vanilla-flavoured syrup, milk and caramel sauce. Sweet, creamy, and perfect for caramel lovers.

title: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
detail: Our slow-steeped Cold Brew topped with a delicate float of vanilla sweet cream that cascades throughout the cup. A perfect balance of bold and smooth.

title: Cold Brew
detail: Slow-steeped, small-batch, and super smooth. Developed to heighten the rich, naturally sweet flavor created during cold brewing.

title: Mango Passion Frappuccino
detail: A tropical mango and passionfruit infusion, perfectly blended with fruity hibiscus tea and ice. Refreshing and full of summer vibes.

title: Raspberry Currant Frappuccino
detail: Made with freshly brewed Teavana tea, blended juice and ice. A fruity, vibrant drink perfect for any occasion.

title: Coffee Frappuccino
detail: Starbucks coffee blended with nonfat milk and ice for a sip on the light side. Smooth, simple, and satisfying.

title: Mocha Frappuccino
detail: Mocha sauce, Frappuccino roast coffee, milk, and ice all come together for a mocha flavor that'll leave you wanting more.
